LanguageData.Alphabeaver.label: alphabeaver
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.description: A large beaver derivative genetically engineered to harvest wood with machine-like efficiency. In the absence of specialized feed, these animals will enter a manic state that compels them to eat trees whole.
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.tools.left_claw.label: TODO
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.tools.right_claw.label: TODO
LanguageData.Alphabeaver.tools.head.label: TODO
LanguageData.Cobra.label: cobra
LanguageData.Cobra.description: A large snake. Cobras can be highly aggressive if provoked - it's better to stay away from these creatures.
LanguageData.Cobra.tools.venomfangs.label: TODO
LanguageData.Cobra.tools.head.label: TODO
LanguageData.Thrumbo.label: thrumbo
LanguageData.Thrumbo.description: A gigantic creature of unknown origin. The thrumbo is gentle by nature, but extremely dangerous when enraged. Its long fur is exceptionally beautiful and valuable, and its razor-sharp horn is very valuable in most markets. Legends say that an old thrumbo is the wisest creature in the universe - it simply chooses not to speak.

LanguageData.Thrumbo.tools.right_foot.label: TODO
LanguageData.Thrumbo.tools.head.label: TODO
LanguageData.Tortoise.label: tortoise
LanguageData.Tortoise.description: This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite.
LanguageData.Tortoise.tools.beak.label: TODO
